data.title: Top 30 Orange County News Websites in 2024
data.meta_description: 40 Best Orange County News Websites. Get the latest news and updates about Orange County, sports, politics, business, culture, society, and much more.
data.meta_site_name: FeedSpot for Journalists, Editors and Reporters
data.text:
1. The Orange County Register

The Orange County Register is a three-time Pulitzer Prize-winning newspaper focused on serving Orange County and helping it thrive. The Orange County Register is part of Southern California News Group, which operates 11 daily newspapers and associated websites in Southern California, multiple weekly newspapers and Spanish-language products and social channels.

Media Outlet ocregister.com

Facebook Followers 165.5KTwitter Followers 234.3KInstagram Followers 91.6K Frequency 4 posts / day Domain Authority 89 Get Media Outlets ContactsGet access to 25k active journalists, reporters, editors and media contacts in 1500 niche categories.Get targeted media contact list in your niche at your fingertips so you can focus on running your campaign.Email us the categories of media outlet contacts you want to reach out for your marketing campaign at anuj@feedspot.com Copy email. We'll share active media list with verified email contacts in an Excel or CSV format.Email us

2. OC Weekly

Published since September 1995, OC Weekly provides readers in Orange County and Long Beach with award-winning news coverage and provocative coverage of arts and entertainment. With a circulation of 45,000, the paper each week reaches more than 503,206 active, educated and affluent readers, who look to the Weekly to guide their lifestyle and entertainment choices.

Media Outlet ocweekly.com

Facebook Followers 96.1KTwitter Followers 49.2KInstagram Followers 59.5K Frequency 1 post / month Domain Authority 74

3. Voice of OC

Voice of OC is a nonprofit, nonpartisan news organization that provides essential and independent reporting on Orange County, California. Voice of OC publishes a variety of content, including news articles, investigative reports, and opinion pieces. It also produces a weekly podcast and hosts a number of events and forums.

Media Outlet voiceofoc.org

Facebook Followers 31.3KTwitter Followers 22.2KInstagram Followers 16.8K Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 60

4. Orange County Business Journal

The Los Angeles Business Journal is a premier B2B media outlet, serving the business community of Los Angeles for over 40 years. It offers weekly content across multiple platforms, featuring news, profiles, and trend analyses to help professionals make informed decisions. Led by an award-winning editorial team, the magazine also produces special editions like the LA500 and the Book of Lists, valuable year-round resources. Additionally, it hosts numerous events, from panel discussions to awards ceremonies, fostering connections within the business community.

Media Outlet ocbj.com

Facebook Followers 5KTwitter Followers 4.3KInstagram Followers 4.2K Frequency 17 posts / day Domain Authority 58

5. Laguna Beach Independent

Founded in 2003, and acquired by Firebrand Media LLC in January of 2009, the Laguna Beach Independent is the local newspaper for Laguna Beach, California. The newspaper features local news, politics, the arts and festivals, news features, local sports, and events.

Media Outlet lagunabeachindy.com

Facebook Followers 8KTwitter Followers 3KInstagram Followers 3.4K Frequency 2 posts / day Domain Authority 51

6. Los Angeles Times » Orange County

The Los Angeles Times is a daily newspaper based in El Segundo, California. It is the sixth-largest newspaper by circulation in the United States and the largest newspaper in the western United States. The website latimes.com is one of the most popular news websites in the United States. It features breaking news, in-depth reporting, analysis, opinion, and commentary from a team of award-winning journalists.

Media Outlet latimes.com

Twitter Followers 3.9MInstagram Followers 1M Frequency 8 posts / day Domain Authority 93 TypeDaily NewspaperFormatBroadsheetLanguageEnglishFoundedDecember 4, 1881Founder(s)Nathan Cole Jr., Thomas GardinerOwner(s)Dr. Patrick Soon-ShiongHeadquarters2300 E. Imperial Highway, El Segundo, CA 90245News Tipstips@latimes.comCustomer Supportcustomerservices@latimes.comCorrectionsreaders.representative@latimes.comOpinionoped@latimes.comObituaries Emailtod@latimes.comPhone(213) 237-5000Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/latimes/Xhttps://twitter.com/latimesInstagramhttps://www.instagram.com/latimes/Youtubehttps://www.youtube.com/user/losangelestimesLinkedInhttps://www.linkedin.com/company/los-angeles-timesMastheadExecutive Chairman : Dr. Patrick Soon-Shiong

Executive Editor : Terry Tang

Managing Editor : Hector Becerra

Editor at Large : Scott Kraft

Deputy Managing Editors : Shelby Grad, Amy King, Maria L. La Ganga

Show More

7. ABC7 » Orange County

ABC7 is the news website of the ABC television network in Southern California. It provides breaking news, weather, traffic, and sports coverage for the Los Angeles area. The website also has a live-streaming channel that can be accessed 24/7. Read news, articles, and all the latest updates from Orange County in the following segment.

Media Outlet abc7.com

Facebook Followers 3.6MTwitter Followers 1.3MInstagram Followers 996.8K Frequency 6 posts / week Domain Authority 83

8. CBS17 » Orange County

The website, CBS17, provides up-to-date news, weather, sports, traffic, and community information for the Triangle area of North Carolina. The website also features a variety of original reporting, investigative journalism, and human interest stories. Stay tuned with the website to read all the latest updates from the Organe County here!

Media Outlet cbs17.com

Facebook Followers 188.2KTwitter Followers 56.5KInstagram Followers 8.5K Frequency 12 posts / week Domain Authority 78

9. New Santa Ana

The New Santa Ana blog was created in 2009. The New Santa Ana blog has become a runaway success - with over 157,000 page views per month and a popular Facebook page with over 36,000 followers. This is the best place to find out what is going on in and around Santa Ana - from charitable events to all kinds of entertainment.

Media Outlet newsantaana.com

Facebook Followers 38.2KTwitter Followers 770 Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 41

10. Daily Titan

Daily Titan is the Independent Student Voice of Cal State Fullerton. The Daily Titan is an editorially independent student publication, website, and social media presence, printed every Monday during the academic year and updated online daily. It operates independently of Associated Students Inc., California State University, Fullerton; the College of Communications; the administration of California State University, Fullerton; and the California State University.

Media Outlet dailytitan.com

Facebook Followers 6.4KTwitter Followers 6KInstagram Followers 8.4K Frequency 5 posts / month Domain Authority 58

11. Newport Beach Independent

The Newport Beach Independent, founded in 2009 by Firebrand Media LLC, serves as a comprehensive source of news for the Newport Beach community. Covering a wide array of topics including local news, politics, arts, sports, and events, the Newport Beach Indy is dedicated to keeping residents informed and engaged with their community.

Media Outlet newportbeachindy.com

Facebook Followers 3.4KTwitter Followers 2.1KInstagram Followers 2.6K Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 44

12. Spectrum News 1

Spectrum News 1 is a 24/7 hyperlocal content network, focused on delivering news and information that addresses the deeper needs and interests of the diverse communities and neighborhoods throughout Southern California. Get breaking news, local headlines, weather alerts, live streaming video and more from Spectrum News, your source for Los Angeles news.

Media Outlet spectrumnews1.com

Facebook Followers 21.1KTwitter Followers 11.2KInstagram Followers 21.4K Frequency 3 posts / week Domain Authority 66

13. Fullerton Observer

The Fullerton Observer Community Newspaper, founded by Ralph and Natalie Kennedy, Roy and Irene Kobayashi, and other friends in 1978, is staffed by local citizen volunteers who create, publish, and distribute the paper throughout our community. The purpose is to inform Fullerton residents about the institutions and other societal forces that most impact their lives, so that they may be empowered to participate in constructive ways to keep and make these private and public entities serve all residents in lawful, open, just, and socially-responsible ways.

Media Outlet fullertonobserver.com

Facebook Followers 3.1KTwitter Followers 304 Frequency 1 post / day Domain Authority 40

14. San Clemente Times

The San Clemente Times is a leading source of local news, events, sports, surf reports, and more from San Clemente, California.

Media Outlet sanclementetimes.com

Facebook Followers 9.3KTwitter Followers 5.5KInstagram Followers 18.3K Frequency 30 posts / year Domain Authority 52

15. Dana Point Times

The Dana Point Times is a local news website that covers South Orange County, California. It is the only independently owned, dedicated local news organization in the area. The website provides news, events, and information about Dana Point, San Clemente, and Capistrano Beach. The Dana Point Times is a leading source of local news, events, sports, surf reports, and more.

Media Outlet danapointtimes.com

Facebook Followers 4.6KTwitter Followers 5KInstagram Followers 11.4K Frequency 30 posts / year Domain Authority 47

16. City of Costa Mesa News

The Costa Mesa Communications and Marketing Division is committed to becoming the public's main source of city information through credibility, innovation, and collaboration. The two main goals of the Costa Mesa Communications and Marketing Division are to promote information and events through a clear and unified voice; and to ensure the public's business is being handled in a transparent matter.

Media Outlet cityofcostamesanews.com

Facebook Followers 13.2KTwitter Followers 10.8KInstagram Followers 16.2K Frequency 1 post / week Domain Authority 35

17. The News of Orange County

Founded in 1893, The News of Orange County is a family-owned community newspaper in Hillsborough, N.C., and is published every Wednesday. The newspaper includes news and pictures about local government, crime, courts, public records, weddings and engagements, church services, social activities, high school and youth sports, and community events and activities.

Media Outlet newsoforange.com

Facebook Followers 6.3KTwitter Followers 2.6KInstagram Followers 2.5K Frequency 30 posts / year Domain Authority 37

18. Aliso Laguna News

Aliso Laguna News serves Laguna Hills, Laguna Niguel, Laguna Beach, Laguna Woods, Aliso Viejo, and Dana Point California! The purpose of the platform is for local schools, community, and religious leaders to publish their information and events.

Media Outlet alisolagunanews.com+ Follow

Facebook Followers 223Twitter Followers 540 Frequency 1 post / week Domain Authority 31

19. Huntington Beach News

Huntington Beach News is your free E-newspaper serving orange county since 1904 and featuring local news, community news, California business reports, features, opinions, people, events, businesses and sports orange county, California (surf city) and the cities of orange county to the world its not just our business name but what we stand for and celebrating 116 years of service to the community

Media Outlet hbnews.us

Frequency 1 post / month Domain Authority 28

20. Irvine Standard

Discover online news updates and article diving into the local community and daily life in Irvine City. Irvine Standard is a community paper by Irvine Company that celebrates the people, places, and experiences that make Irvine America's best master-planned city.

Media Outlet irvinestandard.com

Facebook Followers 33.4KInstagram Followers 3.1K Frequency 20 posts / month Domain Authority 26

21. City of La Habra

Located at Orange County's northernmost corner, La Habra is 7.3 square miles with a population of nearly 62,000 and approximately 21,000 households. A quiet residential community, it is conveniently located within an hour's drive of many beaches, mountain, and desert recreation areas.

Media Outlet lahabraca.gov

Facebook Followers 3KTwitter Followers 4.6KInstagram Followers 2.1K Frequency 5 posts / month Domain Authority 41

22. Irvine Community News and Views

Irvine Community News and Views (ICNV) is Irvine's only free community newspaper. It is published in hard-copy format at the beginning of each month, with frequent updates and added features available to online subscribers. The newspaper covers a wide range of topics, including local news, events, and opinion pieces.

Media Outlet irvinecommunitynewsandviews.org

Facebook Followers 47.2KTwitter Followers 163Instagram Followers 2.7K Frequency 2 posts / week Since Jan 2015 Domain Authority 24

23. Costa Mesa Insider

The City Of Costa Mesa is called the City of the Arts because of its great cultural arts centers such as the Performing Arts Center, South Coast Reparatory, and Segerstrom Hall but it is so much more. From the OC Event Center to world-class shopping at South Coast Plaza, amazing restaurants and parks Costa Mesa really is a special place. Costa Mesa is a great town but it's time that it had its own voice Hopefully this site can be that voice while also sharing news, reviews, and, information about the great city.

Media Outlet costamesainsider.com

Instagram Followers 910 Frequency 2 posts / month Domain Authority 6

24. The Tribune

The Orange County Tribune is a news website that covers Garden Grove, Huntington Beach, Stanton, and Westminster in Orange County, California. Provides coverage of news, opinion, arts, and sports for the four cities. The Trib is a non-partisan news organization dedicated to serving its communities with professionalism and enthusiasm.

Media Outlet orangecountytribune.com

Facebook Followers 651Twitter Followers 60 Frequency 2 posts / day Domain Authority 32

25. Irvine Weekly

Irvine Weekly is the definitive source of information for news, music, movies, restaurants, reviews, and events in Irvine. The goal is to highlight a city on the rise and share stories about the people, the issues, and the businesses that are changing the dynamics of this amazing community.

Media Outlet irvineweekly.com

Facebook Followers 3.2KInstagram Followers 2.6K Frequency 2 posts / quarter Domain Authority 32

26. Orange County Today

OrangeCountyToday.com is a website that provides news, business, travel, and entertainment coverage of Orange County, California. The website has a positive outlook and tone, and it focuses on stories that are inspiring and uplifting. The website's homepage features a mix of recent headlines, featured stories, and photo galleries. There are also sections for news, business, events, travel, and California.

Media Outlet orangecountytoday.com

Facebook Followers 54Twitter Followers 290 Frequency 7 posts / year Domain Authority 19

27. The Hornet

The Hornet is published as a learning experience, under the guidance of Fullerton College's journalism program. The editorial and advertising published herein, including any opinions expressed, are the responsibility of the student newspaper staff. Under appropriate and federal court decisions and California law, college newspapers are free from prior restraint by virtue of the First Amendment to the United States Constitution.

Media Outlet fchornetmedia.com

Facebook Followers 956Twitter Followers 846Instagram Followers 1.4K Frequency 13 posts / quarter Domain Authority 3

28. Huntington Beach Weekly

Huntington Beach Weekly provides the read with all the latest news, articles, updates, and accurate reporting on topics concerning Huntington Beach for the locals.

Media Outlet huntingtonbeachweekly.com

Frequency 3 posts / year Domain Authority 23

Show 29 to 225
